description.narrative: GGF Funds, Cooperativa de Produtores Extrativistas Florestais e Marinhos da Ilha de Marajo (COOPEMAFLIMA) (Cooperative for Farmers, Forest Gatherers, and Fishermen on the Island of Marajo) will purchase seed drying machinery to improve the production time for its members' crops. By acquiring this equipment, the Cooperative, which has 71 agricultural households as members, will speed up the processing of seeds in order to develop oils and butters ready for market. The machinery and equipment purchased will be powered by biomass, including bark and other waste, thus improving the sustainability of the overall project. Additionally, the project will support the sustainable use forest land by establishing economic alternative to timber sales for its members.
